column43:
Notes for Cabinet Office
(Not for publication)
MACC has no contingent labour. Individual pieces of work are commissioned from the Association of Commonwealth Universities but on a management fee basis rather than relating to individuals.

The ICAI figure is zero for February. This figure represents the total costs for staff who are from another government department, the rest of the staff are paid from FCDO payroll therefore those staff costs are included in the figures for the FCDO paybills.
